Potential 1.title: Fine Cooking
Potential 1.description: Ultimate CHOP 'N DUNK! improved: If the ultimate defeats at least one enemy, Da Pan deals +30% Physical DMG for 15s. This effect cannot stack.

Potential 2.title: Harmonized Flavors
Potential 2.description: Talent Salty or Mild improved: Prep Ingredients buff duration +10s, max stacks +1.

Potential 4.title: Special Blend
Potential 4.description: Ultimate CHOP 'N DUNK! improved: Ultimate Energy cost -15%.

Potential 5.title: Fire it Up
Potential 5.description: Battle skill FLIP DA WOK! improved: If the skill hits only one enemy, apply 1 more stack of Vulnerability on the target. Effect only triggers once every 45s.
